dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3078850I] *** Attention Legal Department - rushradio.org
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

To: Copyright

rushradio.org

MIME element (text/plain) 
Our firm represents the Band known as RUSH. 
 
It has come to our attention that your hosting service provides
connectivity 
and hosting services for rushradio.org 
 
 
Per your policy as written below, rushradio.org is in complete violation
of 
your Intellectual Property rules as they maintain protected images and
music 
belonging to RUSH and are publishing them without written consent. 
 
Please have this site removed per your TOS as a lengthy civil action can
be 
avoided. 
 
Please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions. 
 
Thank you very much, 
 
Michael Mosbach, Investigator 
 
THE ASHKELON GROUP 
An Information Technology Detective Agency 
 
www.ashkelon.net 
 
Computer Forensic Investigations 
Network Intrusion & Penetration Testing 
Threat Assessment Management 
Public Figure Protection Services 
 
Los Angeles - Honolulu - Tel Aviv  
PI 21559      PD 62 
 
Tel: (800) 405-7422 
Fax: (561) 892-0698 
 
------------------------- 
Confidentiality Disclosure: The information contained in this message
may be 
privileged and confidential and thus protected from disclosure. If the 
reader of this message is not the intended recipient, or an employee or 
agent responsible for delivering this message to the intended recipient,
you 
are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of
this 
communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this 
communication in error, please notify us immediately by replying to the 
message and deleting it from your computer.  Thank You Very Much - 
www.ashkelon.net 
------------------------- 
 
"Intellectual Property Infringement Policy 
 
Users may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or 
otherwise store on a Server, The Planet Network or its physical 
infrastructure any information, data, material, or work that infringes
the 
intellectual property rights of others or violates any trade secret
right of 
any other person. The Planet has the right to disable access to, or
remove, 
infringing content to the extent required under any law or regulation, 
including the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998. For your 
convenience, information concerning procedures for making claims of 
copyright infringement for purposes of Title 17, Section 512, of the
United 
States Code is contained at the Legal section of our website."
